title: Your Ultimate Guide to Millennial Slang

steps.title: Adulting means doing the tasks that come with being a grown-up.
steps.content: Adulting means doing the tasks that come with being a grown-up. Millennials often use this term in a humorous way to poke fun at themselves for successfully completing adult tasks, like calling the doctorâ€™s office to make an appointment, or setting up auto-pay so all their bills get paid on time. [1] X Research source The term may also be a nod to the fact that members of the millennial generation tend to reach adult milestones (such as having children or getting married) a bit later in life than earlier generations did.
